title: "SK Hynix starts shipping 24Gb DDR5 chip samples"
excerpt: "SK Hynix has started shipping samples of 24Gb DDR5 chips, according to the company. SK Hynix' 24Gb DDR5 chips are manufactured using the company's EUV-based 1anm process technology, with 24Gb in density compared with 16Gb in density that 1ynm DDR5 memory features,"
